description: Travel advice page for Boxing Day 2019

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over the Christmas and New Year period, most of TfL public transport is open. However, planned works and service changes will affect public transport and road travel."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and London Trams services for Boxing Day.
There are changes and planned works on the following services today.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Sunday service (including 24-hour and night routes)","Day routes start at Sunday times","24-hour routes start at around 06:00"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Morden and Euston via Bank","No service between Morden and Camden Town via Charing Cross","Rail replacement buses between Morden and Stockwell for Victoria line services","First trains from around 07:45 on the rest of the line. Last trains at weekday times"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No District line service between Earl's Court and Kensington (Olympia)","No Waterloo \u0026 City line service","Reduced service on all other lines","First trains run from around 07:45","Last trains at weekday times"]}
Most London Overground services are not running today. Trains are running between:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Highbury \u0026 Islington and West Croydon (06:30-22:45)","Clapham Junction and Hackney Wick (09:00-22:00)","Rail replacement buses run between Hackney Wick and Stratford (09:00-22:00)"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Trains every 10 minutes from 08:30 until 00:30","Saturday service between Stratford and Canary Wharf from 09:30"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No regular bookings","Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No Thames Clipper or Woolwich Ferry services today"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Black cabs will charge an extra £4 per journey","There may be an extra charge for private hire vehicles (including minicabs) - check when you book"]}
Santander Cycles are available throughout December, including today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Cycle for free this December. Make as many 30-minute journeys as you like within 24 hours free of charge. Use code SCXMAS19","Check availability of Santander Cycles using the \u003ca href=\"/modes/cycling/santander-cycles/find-a-docking-station\"\u003eonline docking station map\u003c/a\u003e ","Download the Santander Cycles app from the \u003ca href=\"https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/santander-cycles/id974792287?mt=8\"\u003eApp Store\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.gov.tfl.cyclehire\u0026hl=en_GB\"\u003eGoogle Play\u003c/a\u003e "]}
All our other services are planned to run normally.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-12-26T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2019-12-26T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003etraffic status updates map\u003c/a\u003e for Boxing Day","The \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e does not apply today. It resumes on Thursday 2 January"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/ultra-low-emission-zone\"\u003eULEZ charges\u003c/a\u003e apply today"]}
All our other services are planned to run normally.
